android.health.pedometer
Class DistanceChecker

java.lang.Object
  android.health.pedometer.DistanceChecker
All Implemented Interfaces:
DistanceNotifier.Listener
public class DistanceChecker
extends java.lang.Object
implements DistanceNotifier.Listener

This class is responsible for abstracting all sensor handling away from the rest of the core pedometer components (ExerciseSession, ExcerciseSessionList, and ExcerciseSessionInfo). This class handles the sensors and estimates the distance traveled according to the specific monitoring mode it is assigned to use.

Author:
Joel Botner

Nested Class Summary
static interface DistanceChecker.DistanceCheckerListener
          This simple interface simply forms a mechanism for DistanceChecker to update external objects as the distance traveled figure changes.

Constructor Detail

DistanceChecker

public DistanceChecker(Activity theActivity)
Constructs a new DistanceChecker object. Note: Only one DistanceChecker remains active at a time, creating a second one will stop and remove the first. You must finish operations with the current DistanceChecker if you do not wish to lose data.

Parameters:
theActivity - - The Activity that began the monitoring process (used to anchor the monitoring service to the same process).
Method Detail

useGPS

public static void useGPS()
Initialize and utilize the GPS sensors to estimate the distance traveled by the user.

useAccel

public static void useAccel()
Initialize and utilize the built-in accelerometer to estimate the distance traveled by the user.

getDistance

public int getDistance()
Returns the latest estimate on the distance traveled by the user during this session.

Returns:
The estimated currently traveled distance.

registerListener

public static void registerListener(DistanceChecker.DistanceCheckerListener listener)
Registers a DistanceChecker.DistanceCheckerListener with DistanceChecker. There can only be a maximum of one listener at a time, adding a new one will replace the current one (if any).

Parameters:
listener - - The new DistanceCheckerListener to monitor the distance traveled estimates with.

stopMonitoring

public void stopMonitoring()
This method is called when the user has ended the exercise session. It will close the monitoring services and clean up all the related data.

valueChanged

public void valueChanged(float value)
Specified by:
valueChanged in interface DistanceNotifier.Listener

Specified by:
